Introduction

Lee Seung-gi is a South Korean singer, actor, host and entertainer under BPM Entertainment. Known as the "Ballad King", Seunggi has had numerous hit songs such as "Because You're My Woman", "Will You Marry Me", and "Return".

He made his official debut on June 5, 2004 with the studio album 'The Dream of a Math'

Local news outlet Dispatch revealed on January 1, 2014, that Yoona, a member of Girls' Generation, and Lee Seung Gi had been dating since September 2013. SM Entertainment verified the news later that day. It was reported on August 13, 2015, that the couple's hectic schedules were the reason behind their breakup.

Lee Seungi and Lee Da In were rumored to be dating on May 23, 2021, by the local news outlet Sports Khan. Lee Da In's agency later verified the rumors. Lee Seung Gi and Lee Da In made their secret wedding announcement public on February 7, 2023. On November 1, 2023, they announced that they will be welcoming their first child by February 2024.
